change.item:
$Log: plut.comp.demetr.ant_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.9 2010-11-17 16:00:32 gcrane fixed a problem in the header
Revision 1.8 2010-11-13 20:30:21 gcrane several loose ends cleaned up:
* above all -- the basic problem enclitic accent:
a)ndro\s tinos --> a)ndro/s tinos
also:
apostrophes represented as rough breathigns have been fixed:
ei)=t) --> ei)t'
some noise has been cleaned up:
ou(/tws:: --> ou(/tws: floating "'" removed '*fw/kw| --> *fw/kw|
Revision 1.7 2010-11-10 22:57:39 gcrane a bug that removed spaces after ./:/; was fixed
Revision 1.6 2010-11-09 15:46:22 gcrane We have run a script to check capitalized words at the starts of paragraphs, sentences and quotes, lower-casing common nouns and leaving proper names unchanged. The goal is to have files where only proper nouns are upper cased.
Revision 1.5 2010-09-08 15:57:17 rsingh04 added notes
Revision 1.4 2010/08/20 20:27:15 gcrane some errors detected with morpheus fixed -- more to do
Revision 1.3 2010/08/18 17:18:30 gcrane capialization has been normalized as much as possible -- in Greek, we do not capitalize anything bu proper nouns. A number of common nouns at the start of paragraphs and quotations have been converted to lower case automatigcally.
Revision 1.2 2009/12/30 16:53:50 rsingh04 fixed the cvs log keyword
Revision 1.1 2009/12/15 20:52:49 rsingh04 converted demetrius, antony and comparison from sgml to xml and added to hopper. also replaced xml snippets in other plutarch files with their respective entities.
Revision 1.2 1999/07/28 18:27:51 dasmith Added text to REFSDECL.
Revision 1.1 1998/01/09 23:03:45 textgod Added to repository. Passed SGML parse.

body.p:
e)pei\ toi/nun mega/lai peri\ a)mfote/rous gego/nasi metabolai/, prw=ton ta\ th=s duna/mews kai\ th=s e)pifanei/as skopw=men, o(/ti tw=| me
 h)=n patrw=|a kai\ prokateirgasme/na, me/giston i)sxu/santos *)antigo/nou tw=n diado/xwn kai\ pro\ tou= *dhmh/trion e)n h(liki/a| gene/sqai ta\ plei=sta th=s *)asi/as e)pelqo/ntos kai\ krath/santos: *)antw/nios de\ xari/entos me
 a)/llws, a)pole/mou de\ kai\ me/ga mhde
 ei)s do/can au)tw=| katalipo/ntos geno/menos patro/s, e)pi\ th

*kai/saros e)to/lmhsen a)rxh/n, ou)de
 au)tw=| kata\ ge/nos prosh/kousan, e)lqei=n, kai\ toi=s e)kei/nw| propeponhme/nois au)to\s e(auto
 ei)sepoi/hse dia/doxon. kai\ tosou=ton i)/sxusen, e)k mo/nwn tw=n peri\ au)to
 u(parxo/ntwn o(rmw/menos, w(/ste du/o moi/ras ta\ su/mpanta poihsa/menos th
 e(te/ran e(le/sqai kai\ labei=n th
 e)pifaneste/ran, a)pw
 de\ au)to\s u(phre/tais te kai\ u(postrath/gois *pa/rqous te nikh=sai polla/kis kai\ ta\ peri\ *kau/kason e)/qnh ba/rbara me/xri th=s *kaspi/as w)/sasqai qala/sshs. martu/ria de\ tou= mege/qous au)tw=| kai\ di) a(\ kakw=s a)kou/ei. *dhmhtri/w| me
 ga o( path h)ga/phse th
 *)antipa/trou *fi/lan w(s krei/ttona sunoikh=sai par' h(liki/an, *)antwni/w| de\ o( *kleopa/tras ga/mos o)/neidos h)=n, gunaiko\s u(perbalome/nhs duna/mei kai\ lampro/thti pa/ntas plh
 *)arsa/kou tou\s kaq' au(th
 basilei=s. a)ll' ou(/tws e)poi/hse me/gan e(auto
 w(/ste toi=s a)/llois meizo/nwn h)\ e)bou/leto dokei=n a)/cios.

h( me/ntoi proai/resis, a)f' h(=s e)kth/santo th
 a)rxh/n, a)/memptos e)pi\e)pi\ Bekker reads h(, with a single MS. tou= *dhmhtri/ou, kratei=n kai\ basileu/ein a)nq rw/pwn ei)qisme/nwn kratei=sqai kai\ basileu/esqai zhtou=ntos, h( d' *)antwni/ou xaleph\ kai\ turannikh/, katadouloume/nou to
 *(rwmai/wn dh=mon a)/rti diafugo/nta th
 u(po\ *kai/sari monarxi/an.
o(\ d' ou)=n me/giston au)tw=| kai\ lampro/tato/n e)sti tw=n ei)rgasme/nwn, o( pro\s *ka/ssion kai\ *brou=ton po/lemos, e)pi\ tw=| th
 patri/da kai\ tou\s poli/tas a)fele/sqai th
 e)leuqeri/an e)polemh/qh. *dhmh/trios de/, kai\kai\ deleted by Bekker, after Schaefer. pri
 ei)s tu/xas e)lqei=n a)nagkai/as,
e)leuqerw=n th
 *(ella/da kai\ tw=n po/lewn e)celau/nwn ta\s froura\s diete/lesen, ou)x w(/sper *)antw/nios, o(/ti tou\s e)leuqerw/santas th
 *(rw/mhn a)pe/kteinen e)n *makedoni/a|, semnuno/menos. e(
 toi/nun e)sti\ tw=n e)painoume/nwn *)antwni/ou, to\ filo/dwron kai\ megalo/dwron, e)n w(=| tosou=ton u(perai/rei *dhmh/trios w(/ste xari/sasqai toi=s polemi/ois o(/sa toi=s fi/lois ou)k e)/dwken *)antw/nios. kai/toi tafh=nai/ ge kai\ peristalh=nai keleu/sas *brou=ton e)kei=nos eu)doki/mhsen: ou(=tos de\ kai\ tou\s a)poqano/ntas tw=n polemi/wn pa/ntas e)kh/deuse kai\ tou\s a(lo/ntas *ptolemai/w| meta\ xrhma/twn kai\ dwrew=n a)pe/pemyen.

u(bristai\ me
 eu)tuxou=ntes a)mfo/teroi, kai\ pro\s trufa\s a)neime/noi kai\ a)polau/seis. ou)k a)
 ei)/poi de/ tis w(s *dhmh/trion e)n eu)paqei/ais kai\ sunousi/ais o)/nta pra/cewn kairo\s e)ce/fugen, a)lla\ th=| periousi/a| th=s sxolh=s e)peish=ge ta\s h(dona/s, kai\ th
 *la/mian w(/sper th
 muqikh
 a)texnw=s pai/zwn kai\ nusta/zwn e)poiei=to diagwgh/n. e)n de\ tai=s tou= pole/mou paraskeuai=s ou)k ei)=xen au)tou= to\ do/ru kitto/n, ou)de\ mu/rwn w)dw/dei to\ kra/nos, ou)de\ geganwme/nos kai\ a)nqhro\s e)pi\ ta\s ma/xas e)k th=s gunaikwni/tidos proh/|ei, koimi/zwn de\ tou\s qia/sous kai\ ta\ bakxei=a katapau/wn a)mfi/polos *)/areos a)nie/rou, kata\ to
 *eu)ripi/dhn, e)gi/neto, kai\ di) h(donh
 h)\ r(aqumi/an ou)qe
 a(plw=s e)/ptaisen.

*)antw/nion de/, w(/sper e)n tai=s grafai=s o(rw=men tou= *(hrakle/ous th
 *)omfa/lhn u(fairou=san to\ r(o/palon kai\ th
 leonth=n a)podu/ousan, ou(/tw polla/kis *kleopa/tra paropli/sasa kai\ kataqe/lcasa
sune/peisen a)fe/nta mega/las pra/ceis e)k tw=n xeirw=n kai\ stratei/as a)nagkai/as e)n tai=s peri\ *ka/nwbon kai\ *tafo/sirin a)ktai=s a)lu/ein kai\ pai/zein met' au)th=s. te/los de/, w(s o( *pa/ris, e)k th=s ma/xhs a)podra\s ei)s tou\s e)kei/nhs katedu/eto ko/lpous: ma=llon de\ o( me
 *pa/ris h(tthqei\s e)/fugen ei)s to
 qa/lamon, *)antw/nios de\ *kleopa/tran diw/kwn e)/fuge kai\ proh/kato th
 ni/khn.

e)/ti *dhmh/trios me/n, ou) kekwlume/non, a)ll' a)po\ *fili/ppou kai\ *)aleca/ndrou gegono\s e)n e)/qei toi=s *makedo/nwn basileu=sin, e)ga/nei ga/nous plei/onas, w(/sper *lusi/maxos kai\ *ptolemai=os, e)/sxe de\ dia\ timh=s o(/sas e)/ghmen: *)antw/nios de\ prw=ton me
 o(mou= du/o gunai=kas h)ga/geto, pra=gma mhdeni\ *(rwmai/w| tetolmhme/non, e)/peita th
 a)sth
 kai\ dikai/ws gamhqei=san e)ch/lase th=| ce/nh| kai\ mh\ kata\ no/mous sunou/sh| xarizo/menos: o(/qen e)k ga/mou tw=| me
 ou)qe/n, tw=| de\ ta\ me/gista tw=n kakw=n a)ph/nthsen.

a)se/bhma me/ntoi tosou=ton di) a)se/lgeian ou)qe
 tai=s *)antwni/ou pra/cesin o(/son tai=s *dhmhtri/ou pro/sestin. oi( me
 ga i(storikoi/ fasi kai\ th=s a)kropo/lews o(/lhs ei)/rgesqai ta\s ku/nas, dia\ to\ th
 mi=cin e)mfanh= ma/lista tou=to poiei=sqai to\ zw=|on: o( de\ e)n au)tw=| tw=| *parqenw=ni tai=s te po/rnais sunh=n kai\ tw=n a)stw=n katepo/rneuse polla/s: kai\ ou(= tis a)
 h(/kista ta\s toiau/tas trufa\s kai\ a)polau/seis oi)/oito mete/xein kakou=, th=s w)mo/thtos, tou=to e)/nesti th=| *dhmhtri/ou filhdoni/a|, perii+do/ntos, ma=llon de\ a)nagka/santos, oi)ktrw=s a)poqanei=n to
 ka/lliston kai\ swfrone/staton *)aqhnai/wn, feu/gonta to\ kaqubrisqh=nai. sunelo/nti de\ ei)pei=n,
*)antw/nios me
 e(auto
 dia\ th
 a)krasi/an, *dhmh/trios de\ a)/llous h)di/khse.

pro\s me/ntoi gonei=s a)/mempton e(auto
 ei)s a(/panta pare/sxen o( *dhmh/trios: *)antw/nios de\ to
 a)delfo
 th=s mhtro\s e)ce/dwken e)pi\ tw=| *kike/rwna a)poktei=nai, pra=gma kai\ kaq' e(auto\ miaro
 kai\ w)mo/n, w(s mo/lis a)
 *)antw/nion e)p' au)tw=| suggnw/mhs tuxei=n, ei) swthri/as tou= qei/ou misqo\s h)=n o( *kike/rwnos qa/natos.

a(\ toi/nun e)piw/rkhsan a)mfo/teroi kai\ parespo/ndhsan, o( me
 *)arta/bazon sullabw/n, o( de\ *)ale/candron a)poktei/nas, *)antwni/w| me
 e)/xei th
 pro/fasin o(mologoume/nhn: a)pelei/fqh ga e)n *mh/dois u(po\ *)artaba/zou kai\ proedo/qh: *dhmh/trion de\ polloi\ le/gousi yeudei=s ai)ti/as, e)f' oi(=s e)/drase, plasa/menon kathgorei=n a)dikhqe/nta, ou)k a)dikh/santa a)mu/nasqai.
pa/lin de\ tw=n me\n katorqwma/twn au)tourgo\s o( *dhmh/trios ge/gone: kai\ tou)nanti/on o( *)antw/nios, e)n oi(=s ou) parh=n, kalli/stas kai\ megi/stas dia\ tw=n strathgw=n a)nh|rei=to ni/kas.

e)ce/peson de\ tw=n pragma/twn a)mfo/teroi me
 di) au(tou/s, ou) mh
 o(moi/ws, a)ll' o( me
 e)gkataleifqei/s, a)pe/sthsan ga au)tou= *makedo/nes, o( de\ e)gkatalipw/n, e)/fuge ga tou\s u(pe au)tou= kinduneu/ontas: w(/ste tou= me
 e)/gklhma ei)=nai to\ dusmenei=s ou(/tw pro\s au(to
 a)perga/sasqai tou\s maxome/nous, tou= de\ to\ pareskeuasme/nhn eu)/noian toiau/thn kai\ pi/stin e)gkatalipei=n.

to
 de\ qa/naton ou)dete/rou me
 e)/stin e)paine/sai, yekto\s de\ o( *dhmhtri/ou ma=llon. ai)xma/lwto/s te ga u(pe/meine gene/sqai, kai\ kaqeirxqei\s h)ga/phsen
e)pikerda=nai trieti/an, oi)/nw| kai\ gastri\ kaqa/per ta\ zw=|a xeiroh/qhs geno/menos. *)antw/nios de\ deilw=s me
 kai\ oi)ktrw=s kai\ a)ti/mws, ou) mh
 a)lla\ pro/ ge tou= ku/rion gene/sqai to
 pole/mion tou= sw/matos e(auto/n e)ch/gagen.
